snippet: The Empire State Pride Agenda, New York’s leading gay rights organization, abruptly dismissed its executive director, who played a central role in the legalization of same-sex marriage last year.
abstract: Empire State Pride Agenda, New York's leading gay rights organization, fires executive director Ross D Levi, and announces that deputy Lynn Faria is taking over immediately as interim executive director; people involved in the discussions report that despite key role Levi played in the legalization of same-sex marriage in New York State, his unassuming style was viewed as ill-suited to the job.
lead_paragraph: The Empire State Pride Agenda, New York’s leading gay rights organization, abruptly dismissed its executive director, who played a central role in the legalization of same-sex marriage last year.

headline.seo: New York’s Marriage Battle Won, Gay Rights Group Fires Its Director
headline.main: Gay Rights Group Fires Chief, Central in Marriage Fight
headline.print_headline: Gay Rights Group Fires Chief, Central in Marriage Fight

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
